column5: Sorry people i had a crazy day yesterday and forgot all about the Draw ..woke up this morning lodged on seen people asking who won on my site ...well Perch off the Grand River web  board came in this morning and pulled the lucky winner and the lucky winner is Denise Arkell from Markham Ont ...Congradulations you may choose a date from now till the end of June for you and 4 others for a full day Salmon Charter  ..Fishmaster
WOO HOO I'm that lucky winner!!!  I sooo can't wait.  Come on May
Congratulations!!! im sure you will have a great time!! don't forget pics! .. Bud
